page.title: 03ATTITUDES
page.content: Most people are of the opinion that the motorway has split the village in half and that the industrial area is creeping ever nearer, bringing with it pollution and more traffic. One persons attitude was that this area was a dirty place to live in. Anothers that with all the heavy traffic in the area, there would be a tragic accident before long. CLUBS In this area there are two working mens clubs belonging to Sevalco and ICI. Other clubs include a youth club, football, cricket and rugby clubs plus a friendly club for senior citizens and a skittles group.These clubs are open to the local community.
